verses.verse: Now<WG1161> in<WG1722> those<WG3778> days,<WG2250> when the number<WG4129> of the disciples<WG3101> was multiplying,<WG4129> a complaint<WG1112> arose<WG1096> from the Hellenists<WG1675> against<WG4314> the Hebrews,<WG1445> because<WG3754> their<WG846> widows<WG5503> were neglected<WG3865> in<WG1722> the daily<WG2522> service.<WG1248>

The<WG1161> twelve<WG1427> summoned<WG4341> the multitude<WG4128> of the disciples<WG3101> and<WG1161> said,<WG2036> "It is<WG2076> not<WG3756> appropriate<WG701> for<WG2641> us<WG2248> to forsake<WG2641> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> and serve<WG1247> tables.<WG5132>

Therefore<WG3767> select from among you,<WG5216> brothers,<WG80> seven<WG2033> men<WG435> of<WG1537> good report,<WG3140> full<WG4134> of<WG1537> the Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> of wisdom,<WG4678> whom<WG3739> we may appoint<WG2525> over<WG1909> this<WG5026> business.<WG5532>
But<WG1161> we<WG2249> will continue steadfastly<WG4342> in prayer<WG4335> and<WG2532> in the ministry<WG1248> of the word.<WG3056>"

These<WG2532> words<WG3056> pleased<WG700> <WG1799> the whole<WG3956> multitude.<WG4128> They<WG2532> chose<WG1586> Stephen,<WG4736> a<WG1799> man<WG435> full<WG4134> of faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> of the Holy<WG40> Spirit,<WG4151> Philip,<WG5376> Prochorus,<WG4402> Nicanor,<WG3527> Timon,<WG5096> Parmenas,<WG3937> and<WG2532> Nicolaus,<WG3532> a proselyte<WG4339> of Antioch;<WG491>
whom<WG3739> they set<WG2476> before<WG1799> the apostles.<WG652> When<WG2532> they had prayed,<WG4336> they laid<WG2007> their hands<WG5495> on them.<WG846>

The<WG2532> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> increased<WG837> and<WG2532> the number<WG706> of the disciples<WG3101> multiplied<WG4129> in<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2419> exceedingly.<WG4970> A<WG3793> great<WG4970> company<WG3793> of the priests<WG2409> were obedient<WG5219> to the faith.<WG4102>
<WG1161> Stephen,<WG4736> full<WG4134> of faith<WG4102> and<WG1161> power,<WG1411> performed<WG4160> great<WG3173> wonders<WG5059> and<WG2532> signs<WG4592> among<WG1722> the people.<WG2992>

But<WG1161> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> those who<WG3588> were of<WG1537> the synagogue<WG4864> called<WG3004> "The Libertines,<WG3032>" and<WG2532> of the Cyrenians,<WG2956> of the Alexandrians,<WG221> and<WG2532> of<WG575> those<WG3588> of Cilicia<WG2791> and<WG2532> Asia<WG773> arose,<WG4802> disputing with Stephen.<WG4736>
They<WG2532> weren't<WG2480> <WG3756> able<WG2480> to withstand<WG436> the wisdom<WG4678> and<WG2532> the Spirit<WG4151> by which<WG3739> he spoke.<WG2980>

Then<WG5119> they secretly induced<WG5260> men<WG435> to say,<WG3754> "We have heard<WG191> him<WG846> speak<WG2980> blasphemous<WG989> words<WG4487> against<WG1519> Moses<WG3475> and<WG2532> God.<WG2316>"

They<WG5037> stirred up<WG4787> the people,<WG2992> the<WG2532> elders,<WG4245> and<WG2532> the scribes,<WG1122> and<WG2532> came against<WG2186> him and<WG2532> seized<WG4884> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> brought<WG71> him in to<WG1519> the council,<WG4892>

and<WG5037> set up<WG2476> false<WG5571> witnesses<WG3144> who said,<WG3004> "This<WG3778> man<WG444> never<WG3756> stops<WG3973> speaking<WG2980> blasphemous<WG989> words<WG4487> against<WG2596> this<WG5127> holy<WG40> place<WG5117> and<WG2532> the law.<WG3551>

For<WG1063> we have heard<WG191> him<WG846> say<WG3004> that<WG3754> this<WG3778> Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth<WG3480> will destroy<WG2647> this<WG5126> place,<WG5117> and<WG2532> will change<WG236> the customs<WG1485> which<WG3739> Moses<WG3475> delivered<WG3860> to us.<WG2254>"

<WG2532> All<WG537> who sat<WG2516> in<WG1722> the council,<WG4892> fastening<WG816> their eyes on<WG1519> him,<WG846> saw<WG1492> his<WG846> face<WG4383> like it was<WG5616> the face<WG4383> of an angel.<WG32>
